The following are community links that I have made which may be useful
for promoting Ubuntu within the Australian Community. (This is a scratchpad for myself, and is not ment to be complete is any sense.)

== Organisations ==
=== National ===

* Adult Learning Australia Inc. - http://www.ala.asn.au/

Adult Learning Australia (ALA) is the national peak body representing organisations and individuals in the adult learning field.

=== South Australia ===

* CISA - Community Information Strategies Australia Inc. - http://www.cisa.asn.au

CISA (Community Information Strategies Australia Inc.) is the peak community information organisation in South Australia, providing essential community services information and information management services including software, consultancy and training.

=== Salisbury Council ===

* Salisbury Council Library - http://cweb.salisbury.sa.gov.au/manifest/servlet/page?pg=1228
